cause.description:
all over the world...there are children that dont go to skool... dont lead a normal life because they have to work days nights, weekends...now you may not think that is sop bad cause where you live there is a thing called minimum wage witch is currently 8.50 but in other countries is like 0.05!!!! CHLIDREN SHOULD BE FREE....free to eat cookies and milk...watch carrtoons an weekends...they shouldent be forced to work...
1. children shouldent have to work
2. its not right
3. they have rights
cause.name: stop child labour
